price: Wͻn a wͻbεyε tibͻnefoͻ no deε wͻn wͻ Ogya no mu, na emu na wͻbɛgu ahome kokoͻ adi apenesie.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُواْ فَفِي ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَشَهِيقٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna shaqū fafī al-nāri lahum fīhā zafīrun washahīqun
